elements.name: panel3
elements.title: A sports club has organized and carried out a running event. The budget and accounting figures are listed in the table provided. Answer the questions listed.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What is the return on entry fees dependent on?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Which budget variances are the main causes of the lower profit?
elements.correctAnswer:
Lower income from entry fees and sponsors, 
greater costs for advertising/Internet, medals/prize money and administrative costs

elements.name: question5
elements.title: How can the costs of the security service be precisely planned?

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: A sports club has organized and carried out a running event. The budget and accounting figures are listed in the table provided. Answer the questions listed.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Was the organization of the event worthwhile for the association?
elements.correctAnswer: Yes, the profit is lower than planned, but still over CHF 3000.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: Which items are difficult to plan?

elements.name: question8
elements.title: What measures could be taken to achieve a greater profit at the next running event?
elements.correctAnswer: Increase in entry fees, cost savings

elements.name: question9
elements.title: What could the club members contribute to a better result?
elements.correctAnswer: Free cooperation for organization, marshals and possibly security service
